reviewText: A clear demonstrational introduction to MFR, which demonstrates nicely the common techniques.  Although fairly basic, i would recommend it to those who do not already use much MFR and want to incorporate more into their canine remedial massage work. A DVD on advanced MFR would be great!

Wow this really is a fantastic video and I loved the visual and descriptive narration of how everything works regarding the tissues.  This is a well done video and super helpful, professional instruction of how to apply dog massage.  I am THRILLED to own this and will watch over and over, as this inspires me to become a professional myself in this line of work.
